headline: Solventum Amends Thermo Fisher Deal, Retains Water Filtration Business
summary: Solventum Corporation (NYSE:SOLV) is one of the best new stocks to buy now. On June 25, Solventum announced an amendment to its transaction agreement with Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. (NYSE:TMO). The revised agreement now excludes Solventum’s drinking water filtration business from the assets being acquired by Thermo Fisher. Consequently, the cash consideration for the acquisition […]
